about1: God has selected very few of us to live our lives the way we want to. So many people do not get to live it the way they have desired or planned. I consider myself very lucky to have received this opportunity and that is why I try to make the most of it. I have been the same since childhood. I am very fun loving and try to enjoy every bit of my life. The reason why I do this is because I like to live in the moment and have as much fun as I can and not wait for the next time. Many people who know me appreciate me for this. Professionally, I am a software engineer and love my job the most. I have always been very sincere and hard working and that is how I have been able to reach where I am right now. I have a habit of making the most of all the opportunities I get. In future also I would like to excel in the same field. As a person, I am very sincere and calm. Isincerely do my work and forget about everything else then. This is also a very good thing in me. I was a very sincere student and after schooling, I did BE from Jabalpur. After that, I did MBA from Pune. My father is a retired Senior Manager and my mother is a homemaker. I have two sisters. One of them is married and is a Software Engineer and the other one is a HR in an MNC. I respect my parents and love both my sisters a lot.
about2: The man I get married to should be working in a good company. This is because I like people who earn their own living. They have a confidence that is incomparable to any other person. That is why I would like my partner to be working in a reputed organization. I want to be very specific about one thing that the man I get married to should be from Madhya Pradesh. This is because I want to stay in the same state where I have grown up. Also, I have an idea of the area. Secondly, if I get married in the same state, I can visit my parents whenever I want to without travelling much. He should be family oriented and must spend some time with his family too. This way he will seek a lot of respect from me. He will not only win over me but my family too if he is like that. I am very emotional and get upset when people hurt my feelings. I hope the man I get married to understands that and takes care of this thing. I am sure he will become my personal favorite if he respects my feelings and emotions. He will get all he wants from this relationship. All he needs to do is support me and love me.

I am a very clean-hearted person and I am sure that even if I have wrinkles on my face one day I will still feel I the same as my heart will remain the same. I am an IT Professional but I am not working at the moment because of some reason. I am sure when I start working I will acquire what I have set as my goal. My father is an Executive Engineer and he has always been my inspiration. I feel that whatever I am today is because of my parents. Other than that, I have loads of friends and I like all of them. I trust them completely and most of the times when I am free I hang around with them. My favorite holiday destination is Goa. The reason why I love that place is that I am admired with its beauty. Every element of that place is fascinating to me. Long drives by motor bikes, sea, free attitude of people etc.
about2: Every woman wants to marry a man who is both liberal and protective. I want the same combination for myself too. I want him to trust me with things and not doubt me, and on the other hand, I want him to be very protective about me and feel what is my problem is his too. He needs to know that I am very career oriented and want to be well settled. I want myself to be known because of me and not because of him. He must understand that and should keep away from my decisions that are related to my career. His suggestions are always welcome but I will not accept any sort of pressure from his side. He can feel free to tell me if he finds something unsuitable in me, but he should not keep that to himself. This will create differences between us. Having a healthy relationship all my life is something that I would prefer to over anything else. I will prefer a man who is very smart so that we can both make a wonderful couple. I don't want him to be extraordinarily good looking but he should be pleasant looking. However, his personality is what is important and that should be very interesting. With all these qualities in a man, I will promise to keep him happy forever. All I need from him is a great deal of support and love.

about1:
I am a well educated, confident, intelligent, mature, jovial, simple & modest girl who believes firmly in God. I am very loving, caring, understanding, soft spoken & down-to-earth. I care for and respect my elders. I am a firm believer of family values. I do care for people who are a part of my niche. Caring for people around me, helping others is something innate in me. I have a very gentle and emotional heart. I am a sweet natured charming girl who is quite emotional & senstive. I believe in simplicity, honesty, hard work and perfection. I am precisely a blend of modernity and traditionalism. I feel I am mature enough to understand life. I firmly believe in God and have a very positive attitude towards life. . Basically, I am a simple and good human being believing in the policy of 'Live & Let Live'. I am a very good learner as well and do not leave any chance of learning something new or experimenting with a novel task. I am also a fitness freak & enjoy regular walks, yoga, & gymming etc. As far as my educational journey is concerned, it goes out as follows:

Ours is a simple, educated, respectable and closely knit, middle class Punjabi Arora family of five members. FATHER: He is working with Delhi Administration.
